text:
in BXE - but it's a lenya problem - i suppose (Lenya 1.2.1 / SVN 04-10-28)

- image upload in general works (site area -> assets -> new asset)
- but uploaded pictures are not visible in bxe image upload popup
- when uploaded in bxe they aren't visible either
- but in (site area -> assets) they are

... and the button to insert an image into the document is also missing

(Moz. 1.6 / bxe 0.9.6-dev Build: 200408220330/r829 shipped with Lenya on 04-10-28)
creator: michael.trindler@id.unizh.ch
gregor@apache.org
text: confirmed. this is a blocker for the release
